imdb.plot outline: This is the story of a 22 year old or so determined young man (Luis Francisco), son of a prosperous landowner (Don Luis) settled in a province located in the northeast of the country. It all starts when one morning Luis Francisco decides to leave his family hacienda to go try his luck in the capital and demands to his father to give him the rightful portion of his inheritance. Despite the opposition of his father and his older brother he manages to get the money and goes to the capital where he goes through countless hardships. However he finds the love in a sweet but long-suffering young lady (Carmen); who is the sister of a not truly reliable dude, a cheating player (Carlos) that drags Luis Francisco into a hell on earth by losing everything, from his money to even his dreams, and realizing the city he thought he owned is just a "Borrowed City". (Sinopsis Argumental en Inglés)
imdb.title: Borrowed City
plot: This is the story of a 22 year old or so determined young man (Luis Francisco), son of a prosperous landowner (Don Luis) settled in a province located in the northeast of the country. It all starts when one morning Luis Francisco decides to leave his family hacienda to go try his luck in the capital and demands to his father to give him the rightful portion of his inheritance. Despite the opposition of his father and his older brother he manages to get the money and goes to the capital where he goes through countless hardships. However he finds the love in a sweet but long-suffering young lady (Carmen); who is the sister of a not truly reliable dude, a cheating player (Carlos) that drags Luis Francisco into a hell on earth by losing everything, from his money to even his dreams, and realizing the city he thought he owned is just a "_Borrowed City_ (qv)". (Sinopsis Argumental en Inglés)
